amendment.description: To fund urgent priorities for our Nation's firefighters, law enforcement personnel, emergency medical personnel, and all Americans by reducing the tax breaks for individuals with annual incomes in excess of $1,000,000.

action.text: Amendment SA 4641 proposed by Senator Dodd.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4641.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 4641 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 62. Record Vote Number: 197.
Ruled out of order by the chair.
